description: An AI agent that explores space data using The Space Devs GraphQL API through an authenticated MCP server. Provides information about rocket launches, astronauts, space missions, and celestial bodies.
name: space_explorer

skills.name: Space Launch Information
skills.description: Search and retrieve information about upcoming and past rocket launches

skills.name: Astronaut Information
skills.description: Get details about astronauts and find out who is currently in space

skills.name: Celestial Body Information
skills.description: Explore information about celestial bodies and space objects

skills.name: Space Mission Details
skills.description: Get comprehensive information about space missions and exploration programs
